page.title: 15TOURISM
page.content: Because the valley lies within the National Park and is an attractive part of it, the area has tourist potential. However there are no hotels within the area and, indeed, only one farm offers bed-and-breakfast accommodation to visitors. Moreover there are no public transport services whatsoever. It follows that,apart from those using their cottages, the only visitors who come to this area are passing through and may stop for a picnic. Some walkers visit the area but, because there is only limited access to the mountains here, this is not an important activity.
